name: raylib-wasm
description: Make raylib games in JS for the web

scripts.build: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) emscripten/emsdk emcc raylib.c lib/libraylib.a -o raylib.js -I include -DPLATFORM_WEB -sASYNCIFY -sUSE_GLFW=3 -sEXPORT_ALL=1 -sLINKABLE=1

author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com>
